channel.title: Wired Keyboard Stops working after about 2 minutes after VM boot
channel.description:
When I boot up my workstation, my keyboard will work for only about two minutes of use in the machine. The machine simply refuses to take any keyboard input. Works perfectly outside of the VM.
Has anyone experienced a similar anomaly?

item.title: Wired Keyboard Stops working after about 2 minutes after VM boot
item.dc:creator: kimstoppable
item.description:
Patrick:
sudo systemctl disable kloak
sudo systemctl stop kloak

Both Kloak commands solved the issue. I no longer have issues with the keyboard,

Thank you.
